content: Hey @briansmith do you mind if I pick your brain about how you build BoringSSL in ring? I'm trying to simplify are (currently very awful, as you've probably seen) build process in Mundane to use fewer non-Rust dependencies, and it looks like you've already figured a lot of this out already.
@Joshua Liebow-Feeser Sure, have somebody email me and we'll work something out.
Oh, it's nothing too complicated - I can just ask here if that's easier for you. Up to you though.
I think it's out of scope of this WG and also if you email me you'd understand better why email makes more sense.
I can also email you, if that is easier.
